treatment1: Adding snacks. High protein and whole grain carbohydrate snacks : peanut butter crackers,protein bar,trail mix,pita chips and hummus,a handful of almonds

Eaing several small meals a day. Sometimes a person may be underweight because they cannot tolerate eating large meals. Instead, a person can eat several small meals throughout the day. : Healthy foods like fruits and vegetables

Incorporating additional foods. A person can add calorie dense food sources to their existing diet,such as putting silvered almonds on top of cereal or yougurt,sunflower or chia seeds on a salad or soup,or nut butter on whole grain toast

Avoiding empty calories. Eating high calorie foods ay cause a person to gain weight but they also have excess fats that could affect a persons heart and blood vessels. A person should avoid fooda that are high in sugar and salt.
treatment2: Maintain a balanced diet with fruits, vegetables, lean proteins, and whole grains.
Exercise regularly with a mix of cardio and strength training.
Get 7–9 hours of quality sleep each night.
Schedule regular health check-ups and screenings.
treatment3: Follow a calorie-controlled, balanced diet rich in vegetables, fruits, and lean proteins.
Engage in at least 150 minutes of moderate exercise per week, like brisk walking or cycling.
Get 7–9 hours of quality sleep consistently.
Consult a healthcare professional for personalized weight management advice.
treatment4: Follow a calorie-restricted, nutrient-dense diet under professional guidance.
Engage in at least 150 minutes of moderate-intensity physical activity weekly, starting gradually.
Prioritize 7–9 hours of quality sleep each night.
Consult a healthcare professional for personalized treatment and monitoring.
treatment5: Follow a medically supervised, calorie-controlled diet plan.
Start with low-impact exercises (e.g., walking, swimming) and gradually increase intensity.
Ensure 7–9 hours of quality sleep each night.
Regularly consult healthcare professionals for tailored treatment and possible surgical options.
